english: Naturally the writer, too, has his view, his bias .
chinese: 作者自然也有自己的见解和偏执。

english: Circumstances and the intolerance of little men had begun to make me lose faith .
chinese: 环境和小人们的偏执，使我失去了信心。

english: What we grasped only with reluctance-and many at home never understood-is that heroes are such because of monomaniacal determination .
chinese: 我们很不情愿地理解到--而国内许多人始终不理解--英雄之成为英雄是因为他们具有偏执狂般的决心。

english: Not all applications need to be so paranoid
chinese: 并不需要对所有的程序都如此偏执。

english: Prison ' s made you paranoid . taik about water under the bridge
chinese: 监狱把你变成偏执狂了
偏执造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: I believe a little paranoia is warranted
chinese: 我相信，只有很少的偏执狂会听信的

english: The most successful paranoid in business history
chinese: 商业史上最成功的偏执狂

english: Why is paranoia a part of my life
chinese: 为什么偏执妄想会成为我生活的一部分？

english: See ? i told you my brother was a maniac
chinese: 看到了?我说过我兄弟是个偏执狂

english: What does that mean ? that i ' m controlling
chinese: 这到底是为什么？我是偏执狂

english: Why is paranoia a part of my life
chinese: 为什么偏执妄想会成为我生活的一部分？

english: Sometimes , the result of extreme paranoia is a phobia
chinese: 有时，这种极度偏执狂的结果便是恐怖症。

english: Do you want to come off as paranoid or trusting
chinese: 你想它以怎样的面目示人，是偏执的还是令人信服的？
